episodes.title: ep 87: Malin Akerman
episodes.summary: This week on Unqualified, Anna and Sim hangout with the wonderful Malin Akerman (BILLIONS, WATCHMEN, THE COMEBACK)! Anna and Malin talk about being event buddies, female friendships, splitting the bill on the first date, and play "Finance Term or Sex Position?” Malin also braves some "Deal Breakers" and "How Would You Proceeds!” You don’t want to miss this one! Listen in and hang out!

episodes.title: ep 86: Lauren Graham
episodes.summary: This week on Unqualified, Anna and Sim sit down with Hollywood sweetheart Lauren Graham (GILMORE GIRLS, PARENTHOOD)! They talk about typecasting, interviews, Valentine’s Day and Lauren’s book “Talking As Fast As I Can"! Lauren also has a run in with Kayla and takes on some Deal Breakers! They then call Peter, who doesn’t know what to do when he falls in love with a man abroad, and Kirsten, whose husband is reluctant about her keeping her maiden name. Tune in! LAUREN GRAHAM! She rules!

episodes.title: ep 85: Bob Odenkirk
episodes.summary: This week on Unqualified, Anna and Sim sit down with comedy veteran Bob Odenkirk (BETTER CALL SAUL, BREAKING BAD, MR. SHOW)! They chat about making the switch to dramatic acting, dog strollers, armpit hair and so much more! Bob also runs into Kayla in the lobby of a hotel and has a high profile general meeting with Karen Sarducci. They then call Sophia, who doesn’t know what to do when her boyfriend's best friend is blatantly rude to her and Jamie, whose boyfriend becomes territorial about her past relationships! Tune in!

episodes.title: ep 84: Charlie Day
episodes.summary: This week on Unqualified Anna and Sim sit down with the hysterical Charlie Day (IT’S ALWAYS SUNNY, HORRIBLE BOSSES, FIST FIGHT)! They talk about pranks, rumpology, comic acting vs. dramatic acting and throw down on some Deal Breakers! Then they call Shelby, who finds out a guy that has been flirting with her is married with four children and Katie, who’s not sure what to do when she finds her new boyfriend on Bumble. Listen in!

episodes.title: ep 83: Stan Lee
episodes.summary: This week on Unqualified Anna and Sim sit down with one of the most recognized comic book icons in history, Stan Lee (MARVEL COMICS, FANTASTIC FOUR, THOR, X-MEN, SPIDER-MAN)! The gang talks about human kindness, Stan’s organization "Hands of Respect,” and play a round of Not So Rapid Fire Questions! Then, they call Kayley who is having trouble getting her husband to eat right and work out. This is a very special episode!

episodes.title: ep 82: RuPaul
episodes.summary: This week on Unqualified Anna and Sim sit down with one of the kindest people in the world, the magnificent RuPaul (RUPAUL’S DRAG RACE, RUPAUL'S DRAG RACE: ALL STARS, WHAT’S THE TEE?)! Ru gives Anna and Sim their drag names, they talk about sexuality, spirituality, their first albums and play a winning round of Would You Rather! Later they call Jo, who doesn’t know what to do about her partners close friendship with an ex, and Jackie, who finds out the guy she’s been talking to is secretly an NFL player! You don't wanna miss this one! Tune in and hang out!

episodes.title: ep 81: Russell Peters
episodes.summary: This week on Unqualified Anna and Sim sit down with one of the most decorated comedians in history, Russell Peters (MADISON SQUARE GARDEN, 02 LODON, LAST COMIC STANDING)! They talk about life on the road, what it was like growing up Indian in Canada, and the time Russell punched someone during Scary Movie 2! After fearlessly taking on some wild deal-breakers, the gang calls Alex, who’s trying to navigate his dating life after constantly finding himself in the friend-zone, and Sarah, who doesn’t know what to do when her husbands avid guitar collecting becomes obsessive! Tune in and hang out with us!

episodes.title: ep 80: Kaitlin Olson and Scott MacArthur
episodes.summary: This week on Unqualified Anna and Sim sit down with the insanely hilarious Kaitlin Olson (IT’S ALWAYS SUNNY, THE MICK) and Scott MacArthur (THE MICK)! The gang reminisces about college, dating now vs. the past, human evolution and what it’s like to work on multiple shows at once! After playing How Would You Proceed, Deal Breakers and Obscure Parenting Trivia they call Kate, who’s not sure what to do when someone she has a past with won’t stop reaching out even after proposing to his girlfriend, and Lindsey, who wants to know if she and her boyfriend are crossing the lines of comfort! Oh boy, it's a good one. Listen in!

episodes.title: 2016 Memorable Moments Vol. 2
episodes.summary: Unqualified is back this week with an episode that is jam-packed with more of our favorite moments from 2016! Listen in as Anna and Sim give you a behind the scenes peek of past interviews with fantastic guests such as Keegan-Michael Key, Katie Couric, Chelsea Handler, Allison Janney, Courtney Love and so many more! They talk about past relationships, creative struggles in Hollywood, social media bullying and reflect on a seriously amazing year. HANG OUT WITH US!

episodes.title: 2016 Memorable Moments Vol. 1
episodes.summary: From the whole Unqualified team we want to say thank you to all of our sweet sweet listeners for an absolutely stellar year! We wanted to throw together some of our favorite moments from 2016 to celebrate a great year so enjoy part one of Unqualified's memorable moments with guests that include Jennifer Lawrence, Chris Pratt, Shaq, Chris Evans, Jenny Slate, Aubrey Plaza and many more! We love you and can't wait to see what shenanigans we get into in 2017! STAY TUNED!

episodes.title: ep 79: Zachary Levi
episodes.summary: Happy Holidays from Unqualified! This week's guest is one of the kindest people in Hollywood: Zachary Levi (CHUCK, TANGLED, THOR)! In this episode, the gang covers everything from the rise and fall of stars, early careers, social media, and rejection. They also put Zach up to the test with some deal breakers and play a new game called “Name The Disney Mental Disorder!” Later, they call Haley, who’s on the fence about asking her boyfriend of a year to move across the country for her, and Meg, who’s nervous about attending a big work event because SMALL TALK IS THE WORST GUYS. Listen in and hang out with us!

episodes.title: ep 78: Jeremy Renner
episodes.summary: WHAM! This week Anna and Sim sit down with America’s tough guy and Anna’s next door neighbor, Jeremy Renner (The Hurt Locker, Arrival, Avengers)! He gets the royal treatment at Imaginarium Studios where Hollywood legend Karen Sarducci pitches projects to him with heavy Oscar buzz. They also talk about the realities of fame and what's it's really like to be a working actor! Afterwards, the gang calls Kelsey, who needs advice on how to survive the holidays with a mother in law who doesn’t like her, and Laura, who’s boyfriend really loves football, maybe even a little too much. Listen in and hang out!

episodes.title: ep 77: Milo Ventimiglia
episodes.summary: Secure your oxygen masks, tighten the yellow straps, and breathe slowly because this week our guest is the man, the myth...Milo Ventimiglia (This is Us, Gilmore Girls, Heroes). Karen Sarducci calls a meeting with the man everyone in town is talking about, and even gets her son Milo (played by Paul Scheer) on the phone so the two Milos can meet!  After some Unqualified deal-breakers, Anna, Sim, and Milo call Jenny, whose husband wants to get his PhD around the same time she wants to have kids.  They also give unqualified advice to Rachel, who doesn’t know what to do when a family she used to babysit for ropes her into the drama of an affair! Oh no! Turbulence! Tune in!

episodes.title: ep 76: Anna's Birthday w/ Jason Mantzoukas, Paul Scheer and June Diane Raphael
episodes.summary: PODSWAP! In this week's episode, Anna and Sim sit down with the insanely funny hosts of the popular movie podcast HOW DID THIS GET MADE?, June Diane Raphael (Grace and Frankie, Ass Backwards), and Unqualified repeat guests Paul Scheer (The League, Fresh Off The Boat) and Jason Mantzoukas (The League, The Dictator)! June and Paul go on a double-date with Jason and his new girlfriend, Kayla, and take a meeting with the most powerful woman in Hollywood, Karen Sarducci! June and Paul also share the story of how they fell in love, and the gang calls Gabby who’s deciding whether to meet up with someone she’s met online. OH, AND DID WE MENTION IT’S ANNA’S BIRTHDAY? Don't miss the party!

episodes.title: Bonus Episode: Anna and Sim hire an intern
episodes.summary: BONUS EPISODE: This week we go Inside Unqualified again as Anna and Sim sit down to interview a perspective intern named Nina! Both Anna and Sim ask the hard hitting quesitons about life, failures, and what it REALLY takes to be a an intern at Unqualified. What will happen when she shows up to the interview and Sim tells her Anna’s in a bad mood? Can she handle the pressure? Will she crack when Chris Pratt walks in? This 19 year old doesn’t know what’s coming so sit in on the interview and see if she gets the job!

episodes.title: ep 75: Isla Fisher part two
episodes.summary: On part two of this week’s episode, Anna, Sim, and Isla Fisher dial up some callers. First they call Dianne, whose boyfriend broke the one rule in their non-monogamous relationship by sleeping with a mutual friend who he claims was “in a dark place.” Next, the team dishes out some unqualified advice to Allison, who’s worried that one of her best friends could potentially be marrying the wrong person. Stakes are high this week, tune in!

episodes.title: ep 74: Isla Fisher part one
episodes.summary: This week on Unqualified, Anna and Sim hang out with actress Isla Fisher (Nocturnal Animals, Wedding Crashers, Confessions of a Shopaholic). They talk about tabloid rumors, peaking at the 2007 MTV Video Music Awards, and what it’s like being a mom in Hollywood, before testing out how Isla would proceed in some crazy scenarios. Karen Sarducci also pencils in a visit with Isla to pitch some feature film ideas with major Oscar buzz! Will she sign on? Listen in and find out! And come back tomorrow for some listener calls!

episodes.title: ep 73: Andy Cohen/Caller Updates
episodes.summary: This week's episode of Unqualified is extra special! Anna and Sim kick off the show with a call to Mr. Reality TV himself, the outrageously funny Andy Cohen (Watch What Happens Live)! Join in as the gang discusses three-ways and Andy shares how he almost lost his "gold star gay" status on a book tour.  Anna and Sim also dish out juicy deal breakers to Bravo's king of drama, and Andy talks about his new hilarious book “Superficial," which is in stores now! Then, Anna and Sim check in with previous callers to see how their unqualified advice panned out. They first follow up with Giovanni (Julia Stiles episode), who was contemplating whether to tell his family that he’s gay and living with his boyfriend. Next, they talk to Polly (Jason Mantzoukas episode), who decided to tell her conservative Christian parents that she’s in love with a Jewish man. Tune in and see how they're doing now!

episodes.title: ep 72: Chris Hardwick part two
episodes.summary: On part two of this week’s Unqualified, Anna and Sim take some calls with Chris Hardwick (@Midnight, Nerdist)! First, the team calls Rebecca, who has recently become a nanny and is now being blamed by the mom for the kids bad grades. The team then calls Sharleen, who has started receiving notes from a secret admirer at her work which have started to become a little crazy! Listen to find out what happens!

episodes.title: ep 71: Chris Hardwick part one
episodes.summary: "PODSWAP! On part one of this week’s Unqualified, Anna and Sim hang out with the podcast king himself, Chris Hardwick (@Midnight, Nerdist)! They talk about navigating Potterworld, running into celebrities, nerd trivia, hookup culture and also meet Paul Bunyan’s great great great niece!" We love him! You love him! Tune in!"

episodes.title: ep 70: Seth Rogen Live part two
episodes.summary: In part two of this weeks Unqualified Anna, Sim and comedy Superhuman Seth Rogen (Superbad, Knocked Up, Sausage Party) take calls from Angel, who doesn’t know what to do about his relationship with a man who lied for three months about his identity, Stephanie, who's a law student that is recently divorced dealing with dating and her parents skepticism based on the past relationship, and Amy, who’s debating whether or not to date a guy her friend has a crush on. Plot twist HE WON THE BACHELOR!"

episodes.title: ep 69: Seth Rogen Live part one
episodes.summary: Join in the fun at Entertainment Weekly's PopFest when Anna and Sim headline with funny man Seth Rogen (Superbad, Knocked Up, Sausage Party)! Swoon! The show is opened by the USC marching band and is jam packed with hilarious moments! In true Unqualified fashion, the gang tests Seth’s knowledge on weed and dives into Seth’s deal breakers. Karen Sarducci makes an appearance, too. You DON'T want to miss this one, trust us!

episodes.title: ep 68: Allison Janney part two
episodes.summary: Part two of this week's show with the return of the insanely cool Allison Janney (MOM, THE WEST WING) is kicked off with a call to Sarah, who needs advice on whether or not she should break up with her boyfriend, and is topped off with a call to Katie, who’s unsure whether or not to take an internship that has a very unexpected twist!

episodes.title: ep 67: Allison Janney part one
episodes.summary: Back by popular demand, Allison Janney (MOM, WEST WING...and basically Queen of the Damn World, ugh) returns to Unqualified!  Allison talks about getting her star on the Hollywood walk of fame and preparing for her Broadway debut. She also meets Karen Sarducci and auditions for a new (and bizarre) HBO show. Then Sim and Allison fight it out in a new game called Who Knows Anna Best? Come back tomorrow for Part 2 when the gang hits the phones for some listener calls!

episodes.title: Bonus Episode: MOM writer/producer Susan McMartin
episodes.summary: BONUS EPISODE: You heard right! At Unqualified we treat you right baby, and this week we're dropping a bonus episode with Writer/Producer Susan McMartin (MOM) who pulls back the curtain and lets us in the Hollywood writers room. Anna, Sim, Susan and Cassie talk about their careers in LA, selling scripts, getting started and what it’s like being a woman in a male dominated industry.

episodes.title: ep 66: Rachel Bloom part two
episodes.summary: Anna, Sim and Rachel Bloom (CRAZY EX-GIRLFRIEND) kick off part two of this weeks episode by playing a round of "How Would You Proceed?" They then take a call from Molly, who's confused on what to do when her best friend admits to having feelings, and Melissa, who wants to know how to confront a self-centered friend about being a more active listener. GUH, RELATABLE. The gang then caps off the show with some "Crazy Ex-Girlfriend" talk.

episodes.title: ep 65: Rachel Bloom part one
episodes.summary: This week Anna and Sim sit down with the raddest and the baddest Golden Globe winning actress, Rachel Bloom (CRAZY EX-GIRLFRIEND)! Anna, Rachel and Sim unpack their experiences clubbing now vs. the past, being teens in summer camp, being married and Rachel tells a story about a shocking social experiment conducted at her summer camp! Finally, Anna and Rachel blueprint their “Golden Girls” inspired retirement plan for 2056- you'll never guess what it is!

episodes.title: ep 64: Dax Shepard part two
episodes.summary: Part 2 picks up right where we left off with an incredibly weird "Deal breaker?." Then, Dax explains why actors are the worst people on the planet! Dax also meets film studio head Karen Sarducci to discuss a Kung Fu movie with a very controversial title. We move to calls and talk to Samantha, who wants to spice up her sex life with toys but she's worried her boyfriend will feel insecure. Finally, Dax and Anna perform the opening scene of PRETTY WOMAN 2!

episodes.title: ep 63: Dax Shepard part one
episodes.summary: Loveable goofball Dax Shepard joins Anna and Sim for another hilarious two-part Unqualified episode. Dax and Anna talk about a couples trip they took to Hawaii at the same time, Dax’s rise in Hollywood, and how men and women have different views on finding someone/being found naked. Dax even has the pleasure of meeting Kayla. The gang then breaks format and makes an early call to Megan, who is concerned about how her eight-month-old twins are affecting her marriage. More fun and another listener call tomorrow for Part 2! If you enjoyed the episode, we would really appreciate review on iTunes.

episodes.title: ep 62: Whitney Cummings Live part two
episodes.summary: Anna, Sim and Whitney dish out live unqualified advice in this episode - with a little help from the audience! First, they call Jen, who’s caught in the middle of a scandalous workplace affair. Then, one lucky audience member, Devlin, joins the gang onstage to get advice on how make his new partner feel comfortable with physical intimacy. Sounds like serious stuff but don’t worry - with Whitney and Anna, you're guaranteed a shit ton of laughs!

episodes.title: ep 61: Whitney Cummings Live part one
episodes.summary: Bummed you couldn't attend the first live Unqualified show with Whitney Cummings? Well now you can get in on the fun! Join Anna, Sim and Whitney at the Nerdmelt Showroom in LA for a candid convo about Whitney's sexual past (11:30), bridal parties (17:00), and of course, some deal breakers!  Anna also calls up on stage a very popular surprise guest (25:50). Don’t miss part two tomorrow when we take a live call and give one lucky audience member some unqualified relationship advice!

episodes.title: ep 60: Katie Couric part two
episodes.summary:
Katie's back, proving that she's far from unqualified when it comes to giving advice! First, the gang talks to Samantha, who is struggling with a very delicate family situation. Next, they help Connie and her fiancé reach a compromise about 90's music at their wedding. Plus, Katie shares a super romantic story about her engagement ring.  

Check out Katie's podcast, Katie Couric, on iTunes.

episodes.title: ep 59: Katie Couric part one
episodes.summary:
Katie Couric brings her warmth, wit, and wisdom to Unqualified this week. She and Anna delve into gender politics issues in journalism and Hollywood, and discuss Katie's work on a thought-provoking new documentary about gender identity. The conversation gets even more personal when Anna, Katie, and Sim discuss their experiences with internet trolls and cyber bullying. And you might be surprised about what Katie thinks are dating dealbreakers! The gang also plays a game called "Rapper or Politician?" and Katie teaches Anna a "valley girl" cheer (as well as correct Hebrew pronunciation).  

Join us tomorrow for Part 2, when Katie dishes about engagement ring and we hit the phones for some listener calls!

episodes.title: ep 58: Ken Jeong part two
episodes.summary: We're back for some calls and more improv in part 2! First, Anna, Ken, and Sim help Samantha decide whether to help keep her teenage daughter's lesbian relationship a secret from her daughter's girlfriend's strict Muslim parents. They also talk to Rebecca, who is unsure what effect her boyfriend starting medical school will have on their relationship. And prepare yourselves for Kayla's craziest Tinder date ever--with Mr. Chow from "The Hangover"!

episodes.title: ep 57: Ken Jeong part one
episodes.summary:
Ken Jeong (DR. KEN, HANGOVER movies) is truly a national treasure. Listen in as Anna, Sim and Ken discuss Ken's remarkable transition from successful medical doctor to comedic superstar, and why practicing medicine is a lot like acting.  There is also another hysterical, improv-packed “Dealbreaker" series, and more #FYS than in any other episode to date. And sure to stay tuned til the end for a surprise finale!  

Join us tomorrow for more fun when we take some listener calls in Part 2!

episodes.title: ep 56: Regina Hall part two
episodes.summary: Part two of this week's episode has a little something for everyone! First, Anna and Regina discuss their early inspirations and explain why it takes thoughtfulness to play someone stupid or insane. The ladies then pitch a remake of "The Golden Girls"---and even improvise a scene from the show! Regina also educates Anna and Sim as to why the classic sitcom "Good Times" is the most frustrating show in history. From there, the gang turns to listener calls. They first talk to Carolyn, whose friends are becoming a little too involved in her relationship. Anna, Regina, and Sim then give Jen advice about how to disinvite her drunk sister-in-law to her upcoming wine tasting bachelorette weekend.

episodes.title: ep 55: Regina Hall part one
episodes.summary: Happy holidays, from Fistgina, aka Anna Faris and her Scary Movie co-star Regina Hall (WHEN THE BOUGH BREAKS). Regina returns to Unqualified this week to reminisce with Anna about their Scary Movie days and even sing a few songs. (And yes, we explain what happened to Regina's first episode!)  Regina also describes her perfect penis for Anna and Sim, and the the gang discusses a promising new cure for constipation. They also play a hilarious round of “DealBreaker" with a new character: Chad. Then we’ll meet another new character named Sasha. Oh, and Kayla returns.

episodes.title: ep 54: Regina King
episodes.summary: Regina King (American Crime, Southland, Jerry Maguire) reigns supreme on Unqualified this week. The 2015 Emmy winner and 2016 Emmy-nominated actress not only fields some of the most outrageous "Dealbreaker" questions to date (you'll never think of the name "Heather" the same way), but beats Anna handily in a game of "Football Player or Stripper" (same goes for "Lucious Pusey"). Regina and Anna also practice accepting Oscars on each other's behalf, read lines from a new stoner movie in a hilarious audition improv, and role-play a mother/daughter-in law having an unusual heart-to-heart. Later, Regina, Anna, and Sim talk to a newly-engaged woman whose fiancé's family remains inappropriately close with his ex-wife.

episodes.title: ep 53: Johnny Galecki part two
episodes.summary: The Unqualified crew calls in reinforcement from Chris Pratt to help out with some thorny issues this week.  First, they talk to a married woman who is struggling to break off an affair with her married colleague—even though she knows it is both wrong and reckless.  They then give some unqualified advice to a caller who has been secretly dating her BFF’s brother against her friend’s wishes.  Anna, Chris, Sim, and Johnny have lots of thoughts about whether and how she should break the news—tune in and find out what they have to say!

episodes.title: ep 52: Johnny Galecki part one
episodes.summary:
Before this week's episode, Big Bang Theory's Johnny Galecki was a podcast virgin. Anna and Sim make sure that his first recording experience is a memorable one, complete with with Unqualified-style relationship hypotheticals and, of course, a Tinder date improv with Anna. In Part 1, Johnny also explains why he gets excited about criticism, what advice Roseanne gave him upon getting his role on Big Bang Theory, and the surprising reason he got into a fistfight with his brother on Christmas morning. Later, Anna and Johnny contemplate male vs. female sexual insecurity, and Johnny shares a hilarious story about dating a woman who did voodoo.  

Join us tomorrow for Part 2 when the gang (plus Chris!) hits the phone to dish out some unqualified advice.

episodes.title: Bonus Episode: ESPN Fantasy Football's Matthew Berry
episodes.summary: Anna and Sim are gearing up for football season and need some advice about how to get their significant others to enjoy their first fantasy football seasons. So who better to call than ESPN fantasy football guru Matthew Berry? Listen in as Anna and Matthew strategize about how she can help Chris win his celebrity league--and beat out Chris Evans and John Krasinski! Matthew and Sim also discuss why women who aren't normally football fans (like Matthew's wife and Sim's girlfriend) should give fantasy football a chance. But don't worry, it's not all football talk! Anna and Sim put Matthew through the ringer with a "Relationship DealBreaker or Not: Football Edition," and find out that football statistics aren't all he's good at analyzing.  Enjoy!

episodes.title: ep 51: Eric Andre part two
episodes.summary: Carrie finds herself in an awkward situation: after scrolling through her boyfriend’s phone, she discovered some incredibly inappropriate texts. Her call to the Unqualified gang leads to a surprisingly thoughtful discussion on what constitutes “cheating.” Then, Anna, Sim, and Eric talk to Jessica, who is freaked out because the rich guy she’s currently dating may be too good to be true.  By the way, if at times you feel like you’re listening to a completely different Eric Andre, there is a reason for that. TWIDDLED MY BEAN! You’ll find out what that means as well!

episodes.title: ep 50: Eric Andre part one
episodes.summary:
Eric Andre is one of the most innovative—and unpredictable—comedians today, so get ready for a wild ride. On this week’s episode, Anna, Eric and Sim discuss Anna’s fan mail to the band 311, Eric’s sexual encounter outside of a castle in Prague, Anna’s kegal breaks on the set of MOM, “Precious” in IMAX 3D, and much more. At the end of the episode, Eric is pressured into taking a bite of something gross—you won’t believe what it is! Join us back here tomorrow for Part 2 when we hit the phones; you’re not going to want to miss out on Eric’s unqualified advice!

 

Be sure to check out Eric on Adult Swim.  And if you really want to laugh, google “Eric Andre/Lauren Conrad” and “Eric Andre/RNC.”

episodes.title: Bonus episode: Tavi Gevinson
episodes.summary: Tavi Gevinson is many things: millennial icon, current TEEN VOGUE covergirl, editor-in-chief of ROOKIE, and the toast of Broadway. In this bonus episode, Anna and Tavi (and, unfortunately, Sim) have a frank and hilarious discussion about success at a young age, how Tavi got her start, and J.J. ABRAMS’ SON! You’ll have to hear Tavi’s story to believe it! No listener calls or games today, but we still find a way to fly off the rails.  So stay tuned til the end and enjoy!

episodes.title: ep 49: Courtney Love
episodes.summary: Anna couldn't be more excited to host the legendary Courtney Love this week on Unqualified. Courtney describes the thrill of performing for a crowd, and gives some revealing answers when Anna and Sim ask her "Dealbreaker or Not?" dating questions. The gang also talks to a female caller whose live-in girlfriend hasn't come out to her family, and tries to help a woman having disagreements about finances with her boyfriend. And the last two minutes of the show may be our best ending yet - you've never heard Anna like this before! Enjoy!

episodes.title: ep 48: Mike Birbiglia part two
episodes.summary: Anna, Sim and special guest Mike Birbiglia (DON’T THINK TWICE) take listener calls for part 2! Brie’s in-laws are pressuring her to have a baby while Mariah can’t stand the fact that her boyfriend is an avid Trump supporter. Will their relationship survive the election? Don’t skip this one! And please don’t forget to rate and review us on iTunes!

episodes.title: ep 47: Mike Birbiglia part one
episodes.summary: The brilliant and hysterical Mike Birbiglia (SLEEPWALK WITH ME, TRAINWRECK) joins Anna and Sim to discuss the phenomenal success of his indie DON’T THINK TWICE, starring Keegan-Michael Key. We also talk about Anna’s performance in LOST IN TRANSLATION, dating apps, and why Mike couldn’t cast Anna in his movie. Plus, Mike turns his awkward Uber ride to Anna’s house into another hilarious improv! The gang also plays "Dealbreaker?” and there may even be an appearance by everyone's favorite Imaginarium Films executive. And don't forget to tune in tomorrow for Part 2 when we go the the calls!

episodes.title: ep 46: Patti Stanger part two
episodes.summary: Judging from all the feedback on social media, you all love Patti as much as we do!  Part Two is a little different; since Patti is our most “qualified” guest to date, we put her to the test. Two female listeners want to know why they can’t attract the men of their dreams…and boy does Patti let them know why! This episode may be a master class on what it really takes to have a fulfilling personal life. Whether you agree with Patti or not, prepare for some #truthbombs!

episodes.title: ep 45: Patti Stanger part one
episodes.summary:
Million Dollar Matchmaker Patti Stanger holds nothing back when she joins Anna and Sim this week. Patti takes Sim to task about buying his girlfriend a ring, and gives Anna some tough love "Million Dollar Matchmaker" style. She also weighs in on relationship deal-breakers, and trades juicy dating stories with Anna. Packed with tips on dating, sex, and general negotiating strategy, you won't want to miss a minute of this riotous episode!  

Come back tomorrow when the gang hits the phones for some unqualified advice.  And be sure to catch Patti on "Million Dollar Matchmaker" on WE tv.

episodes.title: ep 44: Tatiana Maslany part two
episodes.summary:
Emmy-nominated “Orphan Black” superstar Tatiana Maslany dishes out some very impressive advice! First, Tatiana, Anna and Sim advise Amari, who’s unsure if her long-distance crush is manipulating her. The gang then attempts to help Priscilla figure out how help her best friend, who is suffering from an eating disorder. And you'll definitely want to stay until the end to hear what Tatiana will do to her Emmy if she wins!

Please subscribe on iTunes, rate and leave us a review! We love you!

episodes.title: ep 43: Tatiana Maslany part one
episodes.summary: Emmy-nominated actress Tatiana Maslany stops by Anna's house this week to talk Orphan Black, Comic Con, "internalized misogyny," and the mystery that is lunch buffets at strip clubs. Anna and Tatiana perform an Imaginarium Entertainment improv scene and reenact a classic "Pretty Woman" moment.  Anna also recounts the time Sim made the mistake of ranking her intelligence.  Tune in tomorrow for some listener phone calls! And be sure to catch Tatiana on Orphan Black, airing on BBC America!

episodes.title: ep 42: Julia Stiles part two
episodes.summary: Did you listen to part one yet? Part two is even better! Before Julia Stiles owns the box office this weekend with “Jason Bourne”, prepare to be impressed by her amazing advice! Anna, Sim and Julia field one of our most emotional calls since we started the podcast, as Giovani discusses his heartbreaking yet inspiring situation.

episodes.title: ep 41: Julia Stiles part one
episodes.summary: "Bourne Ultimatum" star Julia Stiles joins Anna and Sim for this week's two-part episode of "Unqualified."  Listen in as Julia opens up about her musical ambitions, her pigeon phobia, and why baseball is "her valium."  Anna also recounts her mom's reaction to Scary Movie, and contemplates the many words for genitalia in the English language.  Lastly, Sim and Anna give Julia some off-the-wall hypos involving garden gnomes and the Mets.  You won't want to miss her answers!

episodes.title: ep 40: 2 Dope Queens' Phoebe Robinson
episodes.summary: The outrageously funny Phoebe Robinson, host of "2 Dope Queens" and "Sooo Many White Guys," joins Anna and Sim this week, along with her friend, comedian Jamie Lee. The gang discusses topics including flight attendants, "Sex and the City," nightmare auditions, Anna's Oprah encounter, and Donald Trump!  Also, prior caller Katie (James Gunn episode, Part 2, 15:35 mark) calls in to give an update about the uncomfortable situation with her recently-discovered birthmother. Finally, Anna, Sim, Phoebe and Jamie try to help a listener who is worried about her brother's gold-digging fiancé.

episodes.title: Bonus episode: Inside Unqualified
episodes.summary: We have a special treat in store, dear listeners! Introducing the first episode of "Inside Unqualified," an experimental bonus show that we're trying out in addition to the show you heard this week. Sim hosts a roundtable discussion with Unqualified "insiders," including his girlfriend, Amy; close friends/former musical guests Aria Pullman Ostrander and Josh Ostrander (who wrote and sang the “Unqualified" theme song); and Anna and Sim's longtime friend, actress Alexandra Holden.  The gang relives some of their favorite Unqualified moments so far and calls one of the most loyal Unqualified fans to get her take. Sim also shares some behind-the-scene stories, including the lead-up to Jennifer Lawrence and Chris Pratt's phone call on the first Aubrey Plaza episode, and what he and Amy observed while recording the Chris Evans and Jenny Slate episode. And while Anna isn't on the inaugural episode of "Inside Unqualified," trust us, she definitely feel the love!

episodes.title: ep 39: Shane Dawson part two
episodes.summary:
Have you recovered from the all the craziness that was Part 1? I know you've been patiently waiting a whole 24 hours for Part 2 and we're happy to say it doesn't disappoint! Anna, Sim and Shane hit the phones to help Emily, whose simple disagreement with a close friend has turned into something so much bigger. The gang also offers very sweet words of encouragement to Maria, who's nervous about losing her virginity next month on her wedding night! Oh, and Anna explains the science behind why her p###y is the "tightest in Hollywood." You don't want to miss this.

Did you like this episode? If so, please write a review on iTunes! We love you.

episodes.title: ep 38: Shane Dawson part one
episodes.summary:
For all that YouTube sensation Shane Dawson talks about his "dark side," he's pretty f*cking hilarious. Nothing is off-limits when he stops by Anna's house for a riveting--and raunchy discussion--of topics including his recurring sexual nightmare and fantasy celeb sex tape participants. Later, Anna, Sim and Shane explore the ephemeral nature of celebrity, and Shane shares his unique perspective on digital media stardom. Anna also nails the role of Shane's mom in an improv scene that will have you laughing out loud. Oh, and we promise that after listening to this episode, you'll never look at ranch dressing the same way again!

Join the Unqualified gang tomorrow for Part 2 when we hit the phones for some listener calls!

episodes.title: ep 37: Aubrey Plaza & Retta part two
episodes.summary: Moving on from the fascinating convo about porn in Part 1, the gang hits the phones in Part 2 to take calls from listeners. First, Aubrey, Retta, Chris, Anna and Sim help Gina from Calgary with a "bridesmaid issue."  Then, they talk to Taylor from Boston whose live-in boyfriend wants to move out...without breaking up! Anna, Retta, and Aubrey dish out both tough love and hilarious advice in response.

episodes.title: ep 36: Aubrey Plaza & Retta part one
episodes.summary:
Mini "Parks and Rec" reunion this week! Aubrey Plaza is back by popular demand, this time alongside fellow Parks and Recreation alums Retta and, of course, Chris Pratt. After recalling some hilarious behind-the-scene moments on the show, Aubrey shares her plan for terrifying children on Halloween and Chris posits a theory about the food court in heaven. Retta also keeps it real during an extensive discussion about whether porn is permissible in committed relationships. Plus, Anna takes the now-running studio executive improv game in a new direction - you won't want to miss it!

Be sure to tune in to Part 2 tomorrow when when Anna, Sim, and the Parks and Rec crew take calls from listeners.  And catch Aubrey's new movie, "Mike and Dave Need Wedding Dates" out in theaters July 8th.

episodes.title: ep 35: Frank Grillo
episodes.summary: Everyone's favorite tough guy Frank Grillo (Purge: Election Year, Captain America: Civil War) joins Anna and Sim for another can't-miss episode of "Unqualified." Frank shares how he went from being a Wall Street stockbroker to being an actor -- and what his hometown friends and Italian family thought about it. Anna and Frank also discuss ageism in Hollywood, loud lovers, and have an unforgettable exorcism voice-off.  The gang also plays a rousing new game: MMA Star or Porn Star?  Finally, they give advice to a caller who is uncomfortable about her colleagues' wild partying on business trips, and a woman who wants to disinvite her fiancé's best friend's (terrible) wife from her wedding. But the main takeaway from this episode? F*******ck thoooose d******cks.

episodes.title: ep 34: Keegan-Michael Key
episodes.summary:
The uber-talented Keegan-Michael Key (Key & Peele, Keanu) joins Anna and Sim this week for another hilarious episode of Unqualified. Teeing off on themes from his new film "Don't Think Twice," Keegan and Anna offer reflections on fame, talent, success and providence. Keegan leaves no doubt that he's among the best improv performers in Hollywood when he and Anna revisit the studio-executive scenario from prior episodes.  His hysterical (and inspired!) pitches for sequels to Titanic and Rosemary's Baby are sure to have you in stitches! Later, they talk to a woman whose high school boyfriend, (the "one who got away") surprised her with a romantic -- yet ambiguous -- gesture nine years after their break-up. It's up to the Unqualified crew to deduce what he meant--and what her next move should be.

Be sure to catch Keegan in "Don't Think Twice" in theaters July 22nd!

Later, James draws on his psychology degree even more when the gang calls a woman whose long-absent birth mother is suddenly seeking to reconnect.  Listen in as Anna and James help her grapple with complex family dynamics and questions of self-identity.

episodes.title: ep 30: Dave Bautista part one
episodes.summary:
For a total badass, former WWE star Dave Bautista (GUARDIANS OF THE GALAXY (Drax), SPECTRE, upcoming BLADE RUNNER) sure is a nice guy. In this week’s two-part episode, Anna and Sim meet up with Dave in Atlanta, on location for GUARDIANS OF THE GALAXY: VOLUME 2. Dave shares his remarkable journey from the streets of San Francisco, to the WWE ring, to the set of a blockbuster franchise—with a few stints in jail along the way! The gang also discusses life on the set of GOTG2, Dave’s all-time favorite workout playlist, and the wonder that is Japanese toilets. Later, they play a new WWE-inspired game, in which Dave must match famous wrestlers with their catch-phrases.  Dave even comes up with a wrestling name and signature move for Anna – you’ll never guess what it is!
 
We call listeners with advice for Part 2 tomorrow with special guest Chris Pratt! Be sure to tune in!

episodes.summary:
Part 2 picks up with calls from two Unqualified listeners in need of relationship advice. First, Anna, Sim and Paul talk to a woman whose husband is a terrible gift-giver.  Listen in as Paul enlightens her about the "Languages of Love" and the gang brainstorms about how to point him in the right direction. Next, they call Brittany, a woman who has been involved for six months with a stand-up comedian she met on a dating app. Paul and Anna leave no stone unturned in trying to help her figure out whether she likes him enough to commit to a possible long-distance relationship and, if so, how to talk to him about their relationship...as illustrated through another hilarious role-play. Their advice may or may not be good, but one thing is for sure: Brittany's boyfriend is going to be in a state of shock by the time he finishes listening to this episode!

episodes.title: ep 25: Chelsea Handler part one
episodes.summary:
Chelsea Handler is unfiltered, unapologetic and unlike anyone else. The comedian/talk show host joins Anna and Sim this week, bringing to bear her acerbic wit and take-no-prisoners approach to love and life. In Part 1 of this two-part episode, Chelsea explains why she hates compliments, terms she finds most offensive and what exactly it takes to be her friend. She and Anna also trade break-up stories (you won’t believe how ballsy Chelsea is!) and discuss other dating misadventures. Then, in a new segment, Sim gives Anna and Chelsea twenty guesses to identify a mystery celebrity guest-caller. (See if you can figure out who it is before they do!) After Anna’s unbridled excitement subsides, the trio reflects upon the “intoxicating” effect of fame and the ups and downs of life in the Hollywood spotlight.  
 
Be sure to tune in tomorrow for Part 2 – you definitely won’t want to miss the surprise gift that Anna and Sim have in store for Chelsea!

episodes.title: ep 24: Tiffany Haddish
episodes.summary:
Tiffany Haddish tells it like it is. The breakout star of “Keanu” joins Anna and Sim this week, showcasing both her incredible comedic talents as well as her astounding personal resilience. Tiffany opens up to Anna about her journey from the “hood” to the Hollywood red carpet, discussing how she was shaped by her experience in the foster care system and how she found the strength to pursue—and accomplish—her dreams against all odds. As outrageously funny as she is inspiring, Tiffany also has Anna and Sim in stitches throughout the episode as she talks about her friends, family, and her plan to sell a “special” hair growth product on QVC. And you definitely won’t want to miss Tiffany’s brilliant – and explicit – advice to Anna about how to communicate with men! Finally, the gang talks to a caller whose best friend declined to attend her birthday getaway weekend—even after her husband offered to buy her BFF’s ticket. Not sure she was ready for the advice that Anna and Tiffany dished out!

episodes.title: ep 17: Chris Evans and Jenny Slate part one
episodes.summary:
Get ready for the ultimate Unqualified double-whammy! Captain America himself, Chris Evans, and Jenny Slate (Obvious Child, Parks and Rec) join Anna and Sim for a night of hilarious antics and unforgettable banter. This special two-part episode doubles down on everything you love—two sets of male/female BFFs, two brilliant comedic actresses, and even two superheroes named Chris! In Part 1, Anna, Sim, Jenny, and Chris Evans talk candidly about making friends in Hollywood, personal grooming habits, and the pressure to look great in the digital age. Plus, Chris and Anna improvise an absurd traffic stop, Jenny discloses who her (unconventional) celebrity crush is, and the crew re-casts “Three Men and a Baby” with Captain America, Star-Lord and Iron Man. And you won’t want to miss the answer to one of life’s burning questions: is Chris Evans a “boob” or “butt” man?

Don’t forget to tune in tomorrow for Part 2, when Chris Pratt joins the gang to dish out some unqualified relationship advice!

episodes.title: ep 15: Melissa Benoist
episodes.summary:
SUPERGIRL herself, Melissa Benoist joins us on one of our most entertaining episodes to date! Anna, Melissa and Sim a wide variety of topics including Melissa’s first kiss, disdain for the term “preggers” and the brilliance that is THE NEVERENDING STORY. We also introduce a new segment called “Thank You For Bringing Something Weird…What Is It?” You will not believe the value of one of the items! episodes.title: ep 14: Jenna Dewan Tatum
episodes.summary:
The dazzling Jenna Dewan Tatum (STEP UP, SUPERGIRL) stops by Anna’s house in this lively episode! Jenna shares her favorite show to binge watch and how she fights off assailants in her dreams. Anna, Jenna, and Sim also dish about Channing Tatum and Chris Pratt’s bromance, getting recognized at the grocery store and Anna’s brilliant performance in JUST FRIENDS. Jenna also teaches Anna a few dance moves—with stripper shoes on! (Check out the video on our Facebook and Twitter!) The gang then gives unqualified advice to a woman with concerns about dating “casually,” and tries to help a bride-to-be decide whether her passion for cats is a relationship deal-breaker. Anna’s hubby also pops his head in to weigh in on a call. You DO NOT want to miss his revealing and hilarious advice!

episodes.title: ep 08: Lance Bass
episodes.summary:
Anna’s long-time friend Lance Bass joins her and Sim in this earnest and entertaining episode of “Unqualified.” Among other hilarious moments, Lance and Anna discuss Washington's thriving topless coffee-hut scene, assumptions made about Southerners, Lance’s early days as a boy-bander, and who he would cast to play him in the movie version of his life. The conversation also takes a more serious turn when Lance shares his struggles in coming out to his family and friends (including his band-mates in *NSYNC!). The gang gives plenty of unqualified advice too, this time to a woman who may or may not be in love with her platonic best friend, and a gay man whose straight college buddies are pressuring him to stay in the closet. And speaking of unqualified, Lance helps a woman understand why she is so annoyed with her boyfriend’s quirks—by diagnosing her with a medical condition! This episode is jam-packed. Enjoy!

episodes.title: ep 02: Rosie O'Donnell
episodes.summary:
Anna and producer/co-host Sim Sarna welcome the one and only Rosie O'Donnell! Join Anna and Rosie for a hilarious discussion about their awkward celebrity encounters, kissing Allison Janney, and how Rosie became close friends with Madonna at the height of her fame when the two filmed “A League of Their Own.” Then, in a surprise twist, Rosie takes a call from the supremely talented Aubrey Plaza (Parks and Rec). Aubrey shares how Rosie’s biography gave her the courage to become a Hollywood actress, and ultimately changed her life forever. Anna and Rosie also help a female liberal arts student with her issues dating “soft boys,” and talk to a young man who wonders if it’s okay to be a “prude” despite societal pressures to the contrary in the gay community. Listeners who think they know Rosie are bound to be very surprised by what she has to say. And if you love her already, we promise you’ll love her even more. Enjoy!

Rosie established Rosie’s For All Kids Foundation in 1997. The foundation raised more than $60 million and awarded more than $27 million dollars in grants to over 1,400 child-related non-profit organizations to benefit low-income families across the country. In 2003, Rosie established Rosie’s Theater Kids in order to provide a Broadway experience to children who might otherwise not have the opportunity.
Rosie’s Theater Kids (RTKids) is an arts education organization dedicated to enriching the lives of children through the arts. They serve students who otherwise would not have the opportunity to experience theater, positively changing the trajectory of their lives by providing comprehensive classes in music, dance and drama; thoughtful mentoring; and structured academic guidance.

Learn more and donate by visiting Rosie.com
